1.3.0: Introduced the Syncing service so you can sync your data between devices.
1.2.0: Re-organized and renamed Services, including the ability to use and re-use templates.
1.1.0: Re-skinned the entire project, fixed audio embeds, and set up the "smart" categories of Watch, Read, and Listen.
1.0.0: Initial build. Thanks to VueJS for all the hard work making a truly special framework geared for developer productivity!
